properties.markdownProperty:
Archetype repository must contain objects archetypes. Create a folder named `objects` inside the archetype repository directory.
This `objects` directory will contain the directories for the different archetype categories. Archetypes are grouped by category, they will be shown in different tabs in the application.
Create at least one category directory. They have to be named like 'XX_name' (where XX is a natural number from 00 up to 99). Number defines tab order when they are loaded.
Inside the category directory create an objects folder, assets folder and an `objects.xml` file.
- `objects` folder stores the archetypes XML files. - `assets` folder stores the archetypes assets if any. - `objects.xml` file contain the reference to the archetypes identifiers. There is an example of an `objects.xml` that references an archetype with id `empty-paragraph`.
``` <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <objects> <object id="empty-paragraph" /> </objects> ```
In order to create objects archetypes check the Create archetypes section.
